name: Necromancer
description: Dark sorcerer who commands the dead. Can raise skeletons from corpses and curse enemies with crippling afflictions.

abilities.name: Raise Dead
abilities.description: Raises two Skeleton Warriors from a nearby corpse.

abilities.name: Unholy Frenzy
abilities.description: Increases a unit's attack rate but drains health over time.

abilities.name: Cripple
abilities.description: Reduces enemy movement speed, attack rate, and damage.
